education_text.0: Daniel Paul Friedman (born 1944) is a professor of      redirect    Computer Science Computer Science at      Indiana University Bloomington Indiana University in      Bloomington, Indiana Bloomington, IndianaDaniel Paul Friedman (born 1944) is a professor of      redirect    Computer Science Computer Science at      Indiana University Bloomington Indiana University in      Bloomington, Indiana Bloomington, IndianaFriedman is also a prolific textbook authorFriedman is also the lead author of      Essentials of Programming Languages Essentials of Programming Languages, a textbook on programming languages
